sections.title: Synthetic Data Generation: Create Tailored Test Data
sections.content: Enhance your testing and development processes with our Synthetic Data Generator. This powerful tool allows you to create customized data sets according to specific test cases or from scratch by defining column names.

sections.title: How It Works
sections.content:
Specify Test Case: Define the test case for which you need synthetic data, ensuring relevance and precision currently it handles the test case for family data that has clientID and relation between the family members. 

 Dynamic Data Creation: Our system leverages advanced algorithms to generate data that mirrors real-world scenarios based on your specifications. 

 Custom Data Generation: If you prefer, you can manually input column names and generate data from scratch, giving you complete control over the data structure.

sections.title: What Problem it Solves
sections.content:
Customization: Generate data tailored to your specific needs without manual data entry. 

 Realism: Produce data resembling real-world scenarios for more accurate testing. 

 Flexibility: Create diverse data sets, whether based on predefined test cases or custom requirements.

sections.title: Value
sections.content:
Efficiency: Save time on data preparation, allowing your team to focus on analysis and development. 

 Accuracy: Ensure your tests are backed by realistic data, improving the reliability of your results. 

 Productivity: Streamline your data generation process, boosting overall productivity and innovation.
